title: How have globalization and technology helped the growth of a small business in the US? - Quora

response.answer_text: It has provided online tools and access to capital for a small fraction of small businesses that can most benefit from inorganic growth while stifling traditional small businesses that flourished via organic growth in the past, replacing them with corporate competitors who can price them out of a market for long enough to kill their business, then exert monopolist pricing power. You’ll be seeing a lot of the latter soon, as Amazon sadly has to start raising prices due to the expense of operating during the continuing pandemic, now that all the franchises and Darwin award winning corporate competitors in the mall have gone belly up.
